hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: Passionate about web development, I train every day to improve my skills. Curious, autonomous and determined, I love learning by doing and taking on challenges to progress in web application development.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Full Stack Developer specializing in modern web technologies. With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end development, I create efficient, scalable, and user-friendly applications.

internship.title: Full Stack Web Developer Intern
responsibilities: Participated in the development of an internal management system for companies (employees, tasks, time tracking, complaints)
Worked on secure authentication, role management, data import/export, and dynamic dashboard
Used Laravel, PHP, MVC Architecture, RESTful API design
Front-end development with Blade, Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, JavaScript

getjob.title: GetJob - Job Search Platform
getjob.description: Full-stack web application from A to Z with Laravel and React. Implementation of a secure RESTful API with Laravel Sanctum, real-time chat system and notifications with Laravel Reverb, admin panel with data visualization (Chart.js).

weatherapp.title: Weather App
weatherapp.description: Weather application developed with React.js and styled-components. Integration of the OpenWeatherMap API to display real-time data, city search with error management and weather icons display, dynamic interface with conditional gradient backgrounds according to temperature.

orderservice.title: Order Service with Laravel
orderservice.description: Interactive web application connecting customers and service providers with service management, requests, roles and messaging.

gestionentreprise.title: Company Management
gestionentreprise.description: Interactive web application to manage employees and their time tracking, complaints, projects and company task tracking.

react.title: React from A to Z (Hooks, Redux, Context included)
